lead_paragraph: O'HEARN--Walter D. Jr.,of New York and Southampton, NY died peacefully on July 5th. He was 81. A devoted family man, Walter leaves his beloved wife of 53 years, Denise, and his three daughters, Meghan Benedict (Douglas), Kelly Evans (Jeffrey), and Mary Harris (Richard). He is also survived by his three sisters, Eileen O'Hearn, Neill Miller and Julie Taminiau and his brother, Peter O'Hearn. He is also survived by his seven grandchildren. Walter graduated from Portsmouth Priory, Williams College, New York Law School and New York University Graduate School of Law. He began his career with King and O'Conor, a law firm in New York. He became President of McGrath Services Corporation. He then became a partner in Keane Securities, which later merged into Rafferty Capital Markets. Walter was a member of the Bathing Corporation of Southampton, the Meadow Club of Southampton, Shinnecock Hills Golf Club and the Lost Tree Club in North Palm Beach. His family will receive friends at the O'Connell Funeral Home, Southampton, NY on Friday, July 8th from 3pm to 6pm. A Mass of Christian Burial will be said in celebration of his life at the Basilica Church of Sacred Hearts of Jesus and Mary, Southampton, NY on Saturday, July 9th at 10:30am. In lieu of flowers, the family would appreciate donations in his name to Wiener Family Palliative Care Unit at Mt. Sinai Hospital, NY. 1/3
